articles.title: Zegras traded to Flyers by Ducks for Poehling, draft picks - NHL.com
articles.summary: Zegras traded to Flyers by Ducks for Poehling, draft picks Forward had 32 points for Anaheim this season, has 1 year remaining on contract Trevor Zegras was traded to the Philadelphia Flyers by the Anaheim Ducks on Monday for Ryan Poehling, a second-round pick (No. 45) in the 2025 NHL Draft and a fourth-round selection in the 2026 NHL Draft.

UFC 317: TOPURIA vs OLIVEIRA takes place this Saturday, June 28 from T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas.
